Title: Implement the "two pipes and five reforms" to improve hygiene in the countryside
Designer: Shanghai Art Design Company (上海美术设计公司)
Publisher: Ningxia Hui zizhiqu weishengju (宁夏回自治区卫生局)
Notes: During the Cultural Revolution, the "two pipes and five reforms" (两管五改, liang guan wu gai, i.e., water management, manure management, water wells, toilets, livestock pens, stoves, and environment) were gradually popularized and became the guide for the patriotic health movement in rural areas at the time.
